title: Provides for issuance of distinctive plates to "catholic war veterans of the America"
summary: Provides for issuance of distinctive plates to "Catholic War Veterans of America"; requires additional annual service charge of $10 to be deposited into the DMV distinctive plate development fund.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         1037

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  Sen.  KLEIN  -- read twice and ordered printed, and when
         printed to be committed to the Committee on Transportation

       AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to issuance  of
         distinctive plates for Catholic War Veterans of America

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. The vehicle and traffic law is  amended  by  adding  a  new
    2  section 404-x to read as follows:
    3    S  404-X.  DISTINCTIVE PLATES FOR MEMBERS OF THE CATHOLIC WAR VETERANS
    4  OF AMERICA. 1. ANY MEMBER OF THE CATHOLIC WAR VETERANS OF AMERICA RESID-
    5  ING IN THIS STATE SHALL, UPON REQUEST, BE ISSUED A LICENSE PLATE BEARING
    6  THE WORDS "CATHOLIC WAR VETERANS OF AMERICA".    APPLICATIONS  FOR  SAID
    7  LICENSE  PLATE  SHALL  BE  FILED  WITH THE COMMISSIONER IN SUCH FORM AND
    8  DETAIL AS THE COMMISSIONER SHALL PRESCRIBE.
    9    2. THE DISTINCTIVE PLATE AUTHORIZED IN THIS SECTION  SHALL  BE  ISSUED
   10  UPON  PROOF,  SATISFACTORY  TO THE COMMISSIONER, THAT THE APPLICANT IS A
   11  MEMBER OF THE CATHOLIC WAR VETERANS OF AMERICA.
   12    3. A DISTINCTIVE PLATE ISSUED PURSUANT TO THIS SECTION SHALL BE ISSUED
   13  IN THE SAME MANNER AS OTHER NUMBER PLATES UPON PAYMENT  OF  THE  REGULAR
   14  REGISTRATION  FEE PRESCRIBED BY SECTION FOUR HUNDRED ONE OF THIS ARTICLE
   15  PROVIDED HOWEVER, THAT  AN  ADDITIONAL  ANNUAL  SERVICE  CHARGE  OF  TEN
   16  DOLLARS  SHALL  BE  CHARGED FOR EACH PLATE. SUCH SERVICE CHARGE SHALL BE
   17  TRANSMITTED BY THE COMMISSIONER TO THE COMPTROLLER FOR DEPOSIT INTO  THE
   18  DEPARTMENT  OF  MOTOR VEHICLES DISTINCTIVE PLATE DEVELOPMENT FUND ESTAB-
   19  LISHED BY SECTION NINETY-FIVE-G OF THE STATE FINANCE LAW.
   20    S 2. This act shall take effect on the first of April next  succeeding
   21  the date on which it shall have become a law.


        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD04445-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to issuance of distinctive plates for Catholic War Veterans of America
